title: Ep 482 Liberal Rhetoric is Out of Control
description:
In this episode I address the roots of the dangerous political rhetoric emanating from the far-left.    I also discuss the economics of outsourcing and off-shoring and its impact on our economy.  https://www.wsj.com/articles/the-exporting-jobs-canard-1497482039
